title: LOBSTAMONKEES   VICO-HEROGG1 #1.4
description:
Upon recursion, this is probably the most concise explanation of the "Hikkomori Army of the 12 Monkeys" concept I ever got out - so I'm taking it from unlisted to public and slapped on a fancy thumbnail.

bully on the asynchronous indigo greatest thing responds a day late so 1.3 with 1.4 here for your enjoyment as part of the asynchronous communication video correspondence experiment.
